com.mvp4g.util.config.loader.xml
Class StartLoader

java.lang.Object
  com.mvp4g.util.config.loader.xml.StartLoader

public class StartLoader
extends java.lang.Object

A class responsible for loading the Start tag defined in the configuration file.

Author:
javier

loadElements

public java.util.Set<E> loadElements()
                                                   throws Mvp4gXmlException
Loads a particular set of Mvp4g elements.

Returns:
a subset of Mvp4g elements found in the configuration file.
Throws:
InvalidMvp4gConfigurationException - if

  • elements with duplicate identifiers are found;
  • one of the required attribute names is missing.
Mvp4gXmlException

loadExistingElements

protected java.util.Set<E> loadExistingElements()
                                                              throws Mvp4gXmlException
Loads a particular set of Mvp4g elements if present in the configuration.

Returns:
a subset of Mvp4g elements found in the configuration file or an empty set if no elements were found.
Throws:
InvalidMvp4gConfigurationException - if

  • elements with duplicate identifiers are found;
  • one of the required attribute names is missing.
Mvp4gXmlException
